闭门千息自濛濛,bi'men'qian'xi'zi'meng'meng
闭门秋暑中,bi'men'qiu'shu'zhong
闭门却扫卷旆旌,bi'men'que'sao'juan'pei'jing
闭门群动息,bi'men'qun'dong'xi
闭门试草三千牍,bi'men'shi'cao'san'qian'du
闭门为谢载酒人,bi'men'wei'xie'zai'jiu'ren
闭门相对清,bi'men'xiang'dui'qing
闭门新竹自千竿,bi'men'xin'zhu'zi'qian'gan
闭门野寺松阴转,bi'men'ye'si'song'yin'zhuan
闭门隐几坐烧香,bi'men'yin'ji'zuo'shao'xiang
闭门坐穴一禅榻,bi'men'zuo'xue'yi'chan'ta
蔽面尚疑创,bi'mian'shang'yi'chuang
笔墨虽欲尽,bi'mo'sui'yu'jin
比年两见之,bi'nian'liang'jian'zhi
比年三见之,bi'nian'san'jian'zhi
敝袍不言寒,bi'pao'bu'yan'han
敝袍霜叶空残绿,bi'pao'shuang'ye'kong'can'lv
碧畦黄陇稻如京,bi'qi'huang'long'dao'ru'jing
弊旗仆鼓坐数获,bi'qi'pu'gu'zuo'shu'huo
彼欺以自私,bi'qi'yi'zi'si

敝裘羸马古河滨,bi'qiu'lei'ma'gu'he'bin

禀受苦洁清,bing'shou'ku'jie'qing
并收其子岂不公,bing'shou'qi'zi'qi'bu'gong
病守亦欣然,bing'shou'yi'xin'ran
病瘦已作霜松寒,bing'shou'yi'zuo'shuang'song'han
病贪赐茗浮铜叶,bing'tan'ci'ming'fu'tong'ye
病维摩诘更无言,bing'wei'mo'jie'geng'wu'yan
病为兀兀安身物,bing'wei'wu'wu'an'shen'wu
病闻吹枕海涛喧,bing'wen'chui'zhen'hai'tao'xuan
病翁恃一褐,bing'weng'shi'yi'he
病卧牛衣已数秋,bing'wo'niu'yi'yi'shu'qiu
冰溪结瘅雨,bing'xi'jie'dan'yu
冰下寒鱼渐可叉,bing'xia'han'yu'jian'ke'cha
冰销那复有冰知,bing'xiao'na'fu'you'bing'zhi
冰雪泊楚岸,bing'xue'bo'chu'an

冰崖落屐齿,bing'ya'luo'ji'chi

病眼不羞云母乱,bing'yan'bu'xiu'yun'mu'luan

病眼乱灯火,bing'yan'luan'deng'huo
病叶埋墙曲,bing'ye'mai'qiang'qu
兵意颇不义,bing'yi'po'bu'yi
病吟终少味,bing'yin'zhong'shao'wei
并语长头弟,bing'yu'chang'tou'di

秉烛真如梦,bing'zhu'zhen'ru'meng
病自能起不用扶,bing'zi'neng'qi'bu'yong'fu

不能自营生,bu'neng'zi'ying'sheng

不怕飞蚊如立豹,bu'pa'fei'wen'ru'li'bao

此欢不可忘,ci'huan'bu'ke'wang
此欢真不朽,ci'huan'zhen'bu'xiu
此会恐难久,ci'hui'kong'nan'jiu
此会那可轻,ci'hui'na'ke'qing
此会岂轻掷,ci'hui'qi'qing'zhi
此会我虽健,ci'hui'wo'sui'jian
此计当时已浩然,ci'ji'dang'shi'yi'hao'ran
茨棘尚未容,ci'ji'shang'wei'rong
此计未为非,ci'ji'wei'wei'fei
此间不可无君语,ci'jian'bu'ke'wu'jun'yu
此间不可无我吟,ci'jian'bu'ke'wu'wo'yin
此间道路熟,ci'jian'dao'lu'shu
此间风物君未识,ci'jian'feng'wu'jun'wei'shi
此间风物属诗人,ci'jian'feng'wu'shu'shi'ren
此见宁朝昏,ci'jian'ning'chao'hun
此间有句无人见,ci'jian'you'ju'wu'ren'jian
此间真避世,ci'jian'zhen'bi'shi
此间真趣岂容谈,ci'jian'zhen'qu'qi'rong'tan
此巾何事小团团,ci'jin'he'shi'xiao'tuan'tuan
此景此行那两得,ci'jing'ci'xing'na'liang'dei
此井独能深一丈,ci'jing'du'neng'shen'yi'zhang
此境何殊泛清霅,ci'jing'he'shu'fan'qing'zha
此境萧条却自然,ci'jing'xiao'tiao'que'zi'ran
此境眼前聊妄想,ci'jing'yan'qian'liao'wang'xiang
此君何处不相宜,ci'jun'he'chu'bu'xiang'yi
此君知健否,ci'jun'zhi'jian'fou
此客未易媮,ci'ke'wei'yi'tou
此来种桃经几春,ci'lai'zhong'tao'jing'ji'chun
此郎独静退,ci'lang'du'jing'tui
此老初来百神仰,ci'lao'chu'lai'bai'shen'yang
此老如松柏,ci'lao'ru'song'bai
慈姥岩前自唤渡,ci'lao'yan'qian'zi'huan'du
此乐得有命,ci'le'de'you'ming
此乐固无穷,ci'le'gu'wu'qiong
此乐已难言,ci'le'yi'nan'yan
此乐真不朽,ci'le'zhen'bu'xiu
此理等废兴,ci'li'deng'fei'xing
此理观要熟,ci'li'guan'yao'shu
此理何须更问人,ci'li'he'xu'geng'wen'ren
此理君未瞩,ci'li'jun'wei'zhu
此理宁复在,ci'li'ning'fu'zai
此理甚明白,ci'li'shen'ming'bai
此理谁相直,ci'li'shui'xiang'zhi
此理未易说,ci'li'wei'yi'shuo
此理余莫测,ci'li'yu'mo'ce
此理在既盈,ci'li'zai'ji'ying
此两士贾宁非贫,ci'liang'shi'jia'ning'fei'pin
此路谁不由,ci'lu'shui'bu'you
此路行亦逝,ci'lu'xing'yi'shi
此论我久持,ci'lun'wo'jiu'chi
次律宁非过去僧,ci'lv'ning'fei'guo'qu'seng
此灭灭尽乃真吾,ci'mie'mie'jin'nai'zhen'wu
赐茗出龙团,ci'ming'chu'long'tuan
赐茗时时开小凤,ci'ming'shi'shi'kai'xiao'feng
慈明兄弟孰非龙,ci'ming'xiong'di'shu'fei'long
此名之设缘吾曹,ci'ming'zhi'she'yuan'wu'cao
此墨足支三十年,ci'mo'zu'zhi'san'shi'nian
慈母为择邻,ci'mu'wei'ze'lin
次乃康王谷,ci'nai'kang'wang'gu
此鸟知阴阳,ci'niao'zhi'yin'yang
此岂水薄相,ci'qi'shui'bao'xiang
此去残年尽主恩,ci'qu'can'nian'jin'zhu'en
此去澄江三万顷,ci'qu'cheng'jiang'san'wan'qing
此去风流定慰人,ci'qu'feng'liu'ding'wei'ren
此去归飞识所従,ci'qu'gui'fei'shi'suo'cong
此去还须却佩牛,ci'qu'hai'xu'que'pei'niu
此去还知苦相忆,ci'qu'hai'zhi'ku'xiang'yi
此去渐佳境,ci'qu'jian'jia'jing
此去江淮东复东,ci'qu'jiang'huai'dong'fu'dong
此去料君归不久,ci'qu'liao'jun'gui'bu'jiu
此去若容陪坐啸,ci'qu'ruo'rong'pei'zuo'xiao
此去尚应远,ci'qu'shang'ying'yuan
此去声名不厌低,ci'qu'sheng'ming'bu'yan'di
此去属兰成,ci'qu'shu'lan'cheng
此去未免勤盐齑,ci'qu'wei'mian'qin'yan'ji
此去文书恐独贤,ci'qu'wen'shu'kong'du'xian
此趣由来各,ci'qu'you'lai'ge
此去真为田舍翁,ci'qu'zhen'wei'tian'she'weng
此泉地何偏,ci'quan'di'he'pian
此泉何处觅寒温,ci'quan'he'chu'mi'han'wen
此日使君不强喜,ci'ri'shi'jun'bu'qiang'xi
词如太阿锋,ci'ru'tai'a'feng
此丧彼有获,ci'sang'bi'you'huo
此山出宝以自贼,ci'shan'chu'bao'yi'zi'zei

此山吾欲老,ci'shan'wu'yu'lao
此山无踯躅,ci'shan'wu'zhi'zhu
刺舌君今犹未戒,ci'she'jun'jin'you'wei'jie
此身变化浮云随,ci'shen'bian'hua'fu'yun'sui
此身常拟同外物,ci'shen'chang'ni'tong'wai'wu
此身何异贮酒瓶,ci'shen'he'yi'zhu'jiu'ping
此身江海寄天游,ci'shen'jiang'hai'ji'tian'you
此身将老蚕三眠,ci'shen'jiang'lao'can'san'mian
此身聚散何穷已,ci'shen'ju'san'he'qiong'yi
此身良自如,ci'shen'liang'zi'ru
此身如线自萦绕,ci'shen'ru'xian'zi'ying'rao
此身随造物,ci'shen'sui'zao'wu
此身同寄水云间,ci'shen'tong'ji'shui'yun'jian
此身同夜旦,ci'shen'tong'ye'dan
此身未死得重论,ci'shen'wei'si'de'zhong'lun
此身无计老渔樵,ci'shen'wu'ji'lao'yu'qiao
此身无用且东来,ci'shen'wu'yong'qie'dong'lai
此身醒醉与谁同,ci'shen'xing'zui'yu'shui'tong
此身已是一长亭,ci'shen'yi'shi'yi'chang'ting
此身已是一枯株,ci'shen'yi'shi'yi'ku'zhu
此身应坐不归田,ci'shen'ying'zuo'bu'gui'tian
此身犹是一微尘,ci'shen'you'shi'yi'wei'chen
此身与世真悠悠,ci'shen'yu'shi'zhen'you'you
此身真佛祖,ci'shen'zhen'fo'zu
此身正似蚕将老,ci'shen'zheng'si'can'jiang'lao
此身正在无还间,ci'shen'zheng'zai'wu'hai'jian
此身自断天休问,ci'shen'zi'duan'tian'xiu'wen
此身自幻孰非梦,ci'shen'zi'huan'shu'fei'meng
此身自蘧蒢,ci'shen'zi'qu'chu
此身自籧篨,ci'shen'zi'qu'chu
此生别袖几回麾,ci'sheng'bie'xiu'ji'hui'hui
此生初饮庐山水,ci'sheng'chu'yin'lu'shan'shui
此生此夜不长好,ci'sheng'ci'ye'bu'chang'hao
此生当安归,ci'sheng'dang'an'gui
此生得浮游,ci'sheng'de'fu'you
此生的有寻山分,ci'sheng'de'you'xun'shan'fen
此生定向江湖老,ci'sheng'ding'xiang'jiang'hu'lao
此生独何幸,ci'sheng'du'he'xing
此生更得几回来,ci'sheng'geng'de'ji'hui'lai
此生归路愈茫然,ci'sheng'gui'lu'yu'mang'ran
此生何处是真依,ci'sheng'he'chu'shi'zhen'yi
此生何所似,ci'sheng'he'suo'si
此生何止略知津,ci'sheng'he'zhi'lue'zhi'jin

此生会见三雍就,ci'sheng'hui'jian'san'yong'jiu
此生流浪随沧溟,ci'sheng'liu'lang'sui'cang'ming

此生通脱屡酡颜,ci'sheng'tong'tuo'lv'tuo'yan

此生终安归,ci'sheng'zhong'an'gui
刺史不须邀半道,ci'shi'bu'xu'yao'ban'dao
此诗此画谁当看,ci'shi'ci'hua'shui'dang'kan
此时方急济时才,ci'shi'fang'ji'ji'shi'cai
此诗更欲凭君改,ci'shi'geng'yu'ping'jun'gai

此事今安有,ci'shi'jin'an'you

此诗有味君勿传,ci'shi'you'wei'jun'wu'chuan
此诗尤伟丽,ci'shi'you'wei'li
此时只欲浮云尽,ci'shi'zhi'yu'fu'yun'jin
此书非我谁能双,ci'shu'fei'wo'shui'neng'shuang
此水此茶俱第一,ci'shui'ci'cha'ju'di'yi

此叹吾已久,ci'tan'wu'yi'jiu

此土方岌业,ci'tu'fang'ji'ye
此瓦不自由,ci'wa'bu'zi'you
此外但坐啸,ci'wai'dan'zuo'xiao
此外有黄楼,ci'wai'you'huang'lou
此外知心更谁是,ci'wai'zhi'xin'geng'shui'shi
此味只忧儿辈觉,ci'wei'zhi'you'er'bei'jue

此言当自程,ci'yan'dang'zi'cheng
此言乃籧篨,ci'yan'nai'qu'chu

此夜新声闻北里,ci'ye'xin'sheng'wen'bei'li
此义安可缺,ci'yi'an'ke'que
此意安在哉,ci'yi'an'zai'zai
赐衣缠紫艾,ci'yi'chan'zi'ai
此意复谁省,ci'yi'fu'shui'sheng
此意固亦厚,ci'yi'gu'yi'hou

慈游淡泊欢有余,ci'you'dan'bo'huan'you'yu

此语人信不,ci'yu'ren'xin'bu

此语信不妄,ci'yu'xin'bu'wang
此语要而简,ci'yu'yao'er'jian
此语与时左,ci'yu'yu'shi'zuo
此欲恣挑抉,ci'yu'zi'tiao'jue
此语子谓谁,ci'yu'zi'wei'shui

此中端有卧龙无,ci'zhong'duan'you'wo'long'wu

次子病学医,ci'zi'bing'xue'yi
此子何劳为买田,ci'zi'he'lao'wei'mai'tian
従车数到单于台,cong'che'shu'dao'chan'yu'tai
从臣今日擅文华,cong'chen'jin'ri'shan'wen'hua
従此北归休怅望,cong'ci'bei'gui'xiu'chang'wang
従此不看营丘图,cong'ci'bu'kan'ying'qiu'tu
从此到寒能几日,cong'ci'dao'han'neng'ji'ri
従此定知年谷熟,cong'ci'ding'zhi'nian'gu'shu
従此隔河汉,cong'ci'ge'he'han
丛祠瓜步认前朝,cong'ci'gua'bu'ren'qian'chao
従此归耕剑外,cong'ci'gui'geng'jian'wai
従此归田策最良,cong'ci'gui'tian'ce'zui'liang
従此年年定相见,cong'ci'nian'nian'ding'xiang'jian
従此剡藤真可吊,cong'ci'shan'teng'zhen'ke'diao
従此升堂是兄弟,cong'ci'sheng'tang'shi'xiong'di
从此食黍还心悲,cong'ci'shi'shu'hai'xin'bei
従此西风庾梅谢,cong'ci'xi'feng'yu'mei'xie
从此政成何所报,cong'ci'zheng'cheng'he'suo'bao
従此醉翁天下乐,cong'ci'zui'weng'tian'xia'le
匆匆成鬼录,cong'cong'cheng'gui'lu
葱葱城郭丽,cong'cong'cheng'guo'li
淙淙万音落石颠,cong'cong'wan'yin'luo'shi'dian
葱葱郁郁气佳哉,cong'cong'yu'yu'qi'jia'zai
従公当有时,cong'gong'dang'you'shi
従公已觉十年迟,cong'gong'yi'jue'shi'nian'chi
从古同隋陈,cong'gu'tong'sui'chen
従衡落模范,cong'heng'luo'mo'fan
従横通杂艺,cong'heng'tong'za'yi
従宦无功谩去乡,cong'huan'wu'gong'man'qu'xiang
丛棘哽其口,cong'ji'geng'qi'kou
従教积雨洗残春,cong'jiao'ji'yu'xi'can'chun
従教晋盗稍奔秦,cong'jiao'jin'dao'shao'ben'qin
从教腊雪埋藏得,cong'jiao'la'xue'mai'cang'de
従教匹练写秋光,cong'jiao'pi'lian'xie'qiu'guang
従教世路风波恶,cong'jiao'shi'lu'feng'bo'e
従教四壁空,cong'jiao'si'bi'kong
従今闭口不论文,cong'jin'bi'kou'bu'lun'wen
従今便踏青州麹,cong'jin'bian'ta'qing'zhou'qu
従今潮上君须上,cong'jin'chao'shang'jun'xu'shang
従今岛可是诗奴,cong'jin'dao'ke'shi'shi'nu
従今得闲暇,cong'jin'de'xian'xia
従今更不出,cong'jin'geng'bu'chu
従今免被孙郎笑,cong'jin'mian'bei'sun'lang'xiao
従今却笑风流守,cong'jin'que'xiao'feng'liu'shou
従今事远览,cong'jin'shi'yuan'lan
从今永别人间去,cong'jin'yong'bie'ren'jian'qu
従今有暇无辞数,cong'jin'you'xia'wu'ci'shu
従今造物尤难料,cong'jin'zao'wu'you'nan'liao
従君吏隐中,cong'jun'li'yin'zhong
従君觅佳句,cong'jun'mi'jia'ju
従君觅数珠,cong'jun'mi'shu'zhu
従君学种秫,cong'jun'xue'zhong'shu
従来白足傲死生,cong'lai'bai'zu'ao'si'sheng
従来不许醉红裙,cong'lai'bu'xu'zui'hong'qun
従来不著万斛船,cong'lai'bu'zhu'wan'hu'chuan
従来此腹负将军,cong'lai'ci'fu'fu'jiang'jun
从来贵势公何慕,cong'lai'gui'shi'gong'he'mu
従来蝗旱必相资,cong'lai'huang'han'bi'xiang'zi
従来佳茗似佳人,cong'lai'jia'ming'si'jia'ren
従来觅栋梁,cong'lai'mi'dong'liang
従来破釜跃江鱼,cong'lai'po'fu'yue'jiang'yu

但见屋瓦留沙痕,dan'jian'wu'wa'liu'sha'hen
但见乌衔纸,dan'jian'wu'xian'zhi
但见香烟横碧缕,dan'jian'xiang'yan'heng'bi'lv
但见晓色开扶桑,dan'jian'xiao'se'kai'fu'sang
但见野鹘盘浮图,dan'jian'ye'hu'pan'fu'tu
但见幽人数往还,dan'jian'you'ren'shu'wang'huan
但见玉峰横太白,dan'jian'yu'feng'heng'tai'bai
但见中年隐槐市,dan'jian'zhong'nian'yin'huai'shi
但见竹阴绿,dan'jian'zhu'yin'lv
但教尘土驱驰足,dan'jiao'chen'tu'qu'chi'zu
但教黄犊无人佩,dan'jiao'huang'du'wu'ren'pei
但解闭门留我住,dan'jie'bi'men'liu'wo'zhu
但嗟浊恶世,dan'jie'zhuo'e'shi
但惊草木放春容,dan'jing'cao'mu'fang'chun'rong
蜑酒蘖众毒,dan'jiu'nie'zhong'du
但觉寒无奈,dan'jue'han'wu'nai
但觉红绿眩,dan'jue'hong'lv'xuan
但觉两颊生微涡,dan'jue'liang'jia'sheng'wei'wo
但觉衾裯如泼水,dan'jue'qin'chou'ru'po'shui
但觉檐阴转古槐,dan'jue'yan'yin'zhuan'gu'huai
但可酬恶语,dan'ke'chou'e'yu
但可供一莞,dan'ke'gong'yi'guan
但恐鞭横逸,dan'kong'bian'heng'yi
但恐跛牂随赤骥,dan'kong'bo'zang'sui'chi'ji
但恐城市欢,dan'kong'cheng'shi'huan
但恐此心终未了,dan'kong'ci'xin'zhong'wei'liao
但恐放箸空,dan'kong'fang'zhu'kong
但恐风霜侵发齿,dan'kong'feng'shuang'qin'fa'chi
但空贺监杯中物,dan'kong'he'jian'bei'zhong'wu

但恐酒钱尽,dan'kong'jiu'qian'jin

但恐岁月去飘忽,dan'kong'sui'yue'qu'piao'hu
但恐陶渊明,dan'kong'tao'yuan'ming
但恐造物怪多取,dan'kong'zao'wu'guai'duo'qu
但苦窗中人,dan'ku'chuang'zhong'ren

但苦世论隘,dan'ku'shi'lun'ai
但苦世俗牵,dan'ku'shi'su'qian

但令强筋骨,dan'ling'qiang'jin'gu
但令文字还照世,dan'ling'wen'zi'hai'zhao'shi
但令心有赏,dan'ling'xin'you'shang
但令朱雀长金花,dan'ling'zhu'que'chang'jin'hua
但令滋液到枯槁,dan'ling'zi'ye'dao'ku'gao

但遣先生披鹤氅,dan'qian'xian'sheng'pi'he'chang

刀匕初无欲凊人,dao'bi'chu'wu'yu'qing'ren

刀笔事刑名,dao'bi'shi'xing'ming
道边双石人,dao'bian'shuang'shi'ren
道边修竹水潺潺,dao'bian'xiu'zhu'shui'chan'chan
道不去纷华,dao'bu'qu'fen'hua
道场山顶何山麓,dao'chang'shan'ding'he'shan'lu
道成一旦就空灭,dao'cheng'yi'dan'jiu'kong'mie
倒持龙骨挂屋敖,dao'chi'long'gu'gua'wu'ao
刀尺自有佳人能,dao'chi'zi'you'jia'ren'neng
到处不妨闲卜筑,dao'chu'bu'fang'xian'bo'zhu
到处逢君是主人,dao'chu'feng'jun'shi'zhu'ren
到处聚观香案吏,dao'chu'ju'guan'xiang'an'li
到处卖刀收茧栗,dao'chu'mai'dao'shou'jian'li
到处名园意尽便,dao'chu'ming'yuan'yi'jin'bian
到处先为问道庵,dao'chu'xian'wei'wen'dao'an
到处相逢是偶然,dao'chu'xiang'feng'shi'ou'ran
到处相娱嬉,dao'chu'xiang'yu'xi
到处遗踪寻六一,dao'chu'yi'zong'xun'liu'yi
到处应然无尽灯,dao'chu'ying'ran'wu'jin'deng
到处有残碑,dao'chu'you'can'bei
到处长如到旧游,dao'chu'zhang'ru'dao'jiu'you
倒床鼻息四邻惊,dao'chuang'bi'xi'si'lin'jing
倒床便甘寝,dao'chuang'bian'gan'qin
倒床不复闻钟鼓,dao'chuang'bu'fu'wen'zhong'gu
倒床作雷鸣,dao'chuang'zuo'lei'ming
稻垂麦仰阴阳足,dao'chui'mai'yang'yin'yang'zu
到此乃有无穷渊,dao'ci'nai'you'wu'qiong'yuan
道存百无害,dao'cun'bai'wu'hai
道存目击岂非温,dao'cun'mu'ji'qi'fei'wen
道大如天不可求,dao'da'ru'tian'bu'ke'qiu
道大吾何病,dao'da'wu'he'bing
道德冠遗编,dao'de'guan'yi'bian
道德虽避世,dao'de'sui'bi'shi
道德无贫贱,dao'de'wu'pin'jian
到得月年官又满,dao'de'yue'nian'guan'you'man
道德自濯澡,dao'de'zi'zhuo'zao
道逢南山云,dao'feng'nan'shan'yun
道逢射猎子,dao'feng'she'lie'zi
道逢阳虎呼与言,dao'feng'yang'hu'hu'yu'yan
道耕而德猎,dao'geng'er'de'lie
道骨虽清不畏寒,dao'gu'sui'qing'bu'wei'han
倒挂紫翠屏,dao'gua'zi'cui'ping
倒冠落佩従嘲骂,dao'guan'luo'pei'cong'chao'ma
倒冠落帻谢朋友,dao'guan'luo'ze'xie'peng'you
到官十日来,dao'guan'shi'ri'lai
道馆虽云乐,dao'guan'sui'yun'le
道合由来不易谋,dao'he'you'lai'bu'yi'mou
到后与君开北户,dao'hou'yu'jun'kai'bei'hu
稻花半作秋香,dao'hua'ban'zuo'qiu'xiang
道华亦尝啖一枣,dao'hua'yi'chang'dan'yi'zao
刀几安足枉,dao'ji'an'zu'wang
道集由中虚,dao'ji'you'zhong'xu
到家恍如梦蘧蘧,dao'jia'huang'ru'meng'qu'qu
倒景扶桑射北窗,dao'jing'fu'sang'she'bei'chuang
倒卷黄河作飞雨,dao'juan'huang'he'zuo'fei'yu
到郡诗成集,dao'jun'shi'cheng'ji
到郡席不暖,dao'jun'xi'bu'nuan
到了不如无累後,dao'le'bu'ru'wu'lei'hou
导利时有补,dao'li'shi'you'bu
捣练支床亦何有,dao'lian'zhi'chuang'yi'he'you
稻凉初吠蛤,dao'liang'chu'fei'ha
稻粱且向人间觅,dao'liang'qie'xiang'ren'jian'mi
道路後先能几何,dao'lu'hou'xian'neng'ji'he
道路犹迟迟,dao'lu'you'chi'chi
道路幽险隔云岭,dao'lu'you'xian'ge'yun'ling
稻苗出泥沙,dao'miao'chu'ni'sha
倒披王恭氅,dao'pi'wang'gong'chang
倒倾蛟室泻琼瑰,dao'qing'jiao'shi'xie'qiong'gui
倒倾瓶中雨,dao'qing'ping'zhong'yu
道人不惜阶前水,dao'ren'bu'xi'jie'qian'shui
道人晨起开东轩,dao'ren'chen'qi'kai'dong'xuan
道人出山去,dao'ren'chu'shan'qu
道人传业自天台,dao'ren'chuan'ye'zi'tian'tai
道人得钱径沽酒,dao'ren'de'qian'jing'gu'jiu
道人今辍讲,dao'ren'jin'chuo'jiang
道人绝粒对寒碧,dao'ren'jue'li'dui'han'bi
道人开此轩,dao'ren'kai'ci'xuan
道人偶爱山水故,dao'ren'ou'ai'shan'shui'gu
道人劝我清明来,dao'ren'quan'wo'qing'ming'lai
道人劝饮鸡苏水,dao'ren'quan'yin'ji'su'shui
道人深北山为家,dao'ren'shen'bei'shan'wei'jia
道人手种几生前,dao'ren'shou'zhong'ji'sheng'qian
道人天眼识王气,dao'ren'tian'yan'shi'wang'qi
道人投老寄山林,dao'ren'tou'lao'ji'shan'lin
道人未放泉出山,dao'ren'wei'fang'quan'chu'shan
道人笑不答,dao'ren'xiao'bu'da
道人晓出南屏山,dao'ren'xiao'chu'nan'ping'shan
道人心似水,dao'ren'xin'si'shui
道人胸中水镜清,dao'ren'xiong'zhong'shui'jing'qing
道人修道要底物,dao'ren'xiu'dao'yao'di'wu
道人亦未寝,dao'ren'yi'wei'qin
道人应怪游人众,dao'ren'ying'guai'you'ren'zhong
道人有道山不孤,dao'ren'you'dao'shan'bu'gu
道人有句借宣扬,dao'ren'you'ju'jie'xuan'yang
道人幽梦晓初还,dao'ren'you'meng'xiao'chu'hai
道人有约径须还,dao'ren'you'yue'jing'xu'hai
道人真古人,dao'ren'zhen'gu'ren
道人之居在何许,dao'ren'zhi'ju'zai'he'xu
道人自嫌三世将,dao'ren'zi'xian'san'shi'jiang
到日凭君为舣船,dao'ri'ping'jun'wei'yi'chuan
到日桃花应已谢,dao'ri'tao'hua'ying'yi'xie
盗肉亦小疵,dao'rou'yi'xiao'ci
盗入蒙山不易搜,dao'ru'meng'shan'bu'yi'sou
道散学以圣,dao'san'xue'yi'sheng
道丧虽云久,dao'sang'sui'yun'jiu
到山困卧呼不觉,dao'shan'kun'wo'hu'bu'jue
倒射窗几清而温,dao'she'chuang'ji'qing'er'wen
倒射轩窗作飞雨,dao'she'xuan'chuang'zuo'fei'yu
道胜邹人不更迁,dao'sheng'zou'ren'bu'geng'qian
道士令严难继和,dao'shi'ling'yan'nan'ji'he
道士守玄牝,dao'shi'shou'xuan'pin
到时应让向南枝,dao'shi'ying'rang'xiang'nan'zhi
到手不容辞,dao'shou'bu'rong'ci
稻熟鱼肥信清美,dao'shu'yu'fei'xin'qing'mei
到寺已亭午,dao'si'yi'ting'wu
悼叹吾年逝,dao'tan'wu'nian'shi
道途险且迂,dao'tu'xian'qie'yu
道我能畜积,dao'wo'neng'xu'ji
到我雀罗门,dao'wo'que'luo'men
倒屣发一握,dao'xi'fa'yi'wo
到县问疾苦,dao'xian'wen'ji'ku
捣香筛辣入瓶盆,dao'xiang'shai'la'ru'ping'pen
到晓烂不收,dao'xiao'lan'bu'shou
道眼清不流,dao'yan'qing'bu'liu
道眼无由浑,dao'yan'wu'you'hun
道眼已入不二门,dao'yan'yi'ru'bu'er'men
道眼转丹青,dao'yan'zhuan'dan'qing
道义偶相契,dao'yi'ou'xiang'qi
岛夷为生今独劳,dao'yi'wei'sheng'jin'du'lao
道艺相琢磨,dao'yi'xiang'zuo'mo
道与翛然会,dao'yu'xiao'ran'hui
捣玉扬珠三万斛,dao'yu'yang'zhu'san'wan'hu
倒晕连眉秀岭浮,dao'yun'lian'mei'xiu'ling'fu
道在君臣方自合,dao'zai'jun'chen'fang'zi'he
倒载犹作山公看,dao'zai'you'zuo'shan'gong'kan
盗贼安足论,dao'zei'an'zu'lun
倒着接搔白首,dao'zhe'jie'sao'bai'shou
道真沉溺九流浑,dao'zhen'chen'ni'jiu'liu'hun
道直无往还,dao'zhi'wu'wang'huan
道子实雄放,dao'zi'shi'xiong'fang
德薄安敢偷,de'bao'an'gan'tou
得饱不敢忘,de'bao'bu'gan'wang
得饱还思睡,de'bao'hai'si'shui
德薄人存难,de'bao'ren'cun'nan
的皪荷上珠,de'bo'he'shang'zhu
的皪梅花草棘间,de'bo'mei'hua'cao'ji'jian
的皪走明珠,de'bo'zou'ming'zhu
德齿敬已古,de'chi'jing'yi'gu
得此古椽围尺竹,de'ci'gu'chuan'wei'chi'zhu
得此今已编,de'ci'jin'yi'bian
得此无人态,de'ci'wu'ren'tai
得此一寸芽,de'ci'yi'cun'ya
得地无美恶,de'di'wu'mei'e
得法尚雄深,de'fa'shang'xiong'shen

得逢刘与孙,de'feng'liu'yu'sun
德膏以自泽,de'gao'yi'zi'ze
德公方上冢,de'gong'fang'shang'zhong
得谷鹅初饱,de'gu'e'chu'bao
得官本河朔,de'guan'ben'he'shuo
得归良不恶,de'gui'liang'bu'e
得火铜瓶如过雨,de'huo'tong'ping'ru'guo'yu
得疾为勤民,de'ji'wei'qin'min
得见来禽与青李,de'jian'lai'qin'yu'qing'li

得郡书生荣,de'jun'shu'sheng'rong

得禄尚辞贫,de'lu'shang'ci'pin
得鹿亡羊等嬉戏,de'lu'wang'yang'deng'xi'xi
得米不盈甔,de'mi'bu'ying'dan
得米济饥还小补,de'mi'ji'ji'hai'xiao'bu
得米如得珠,de'mi'ru'de'zhu
得蜜犹应是薄刑,de'mi'you'ying'shi'bao'xing
得妙甘公书,de'miao'gan'gong'shu
德侔乡长亦谁惭,de'mou'xiang'zhang'yi'shui'can
得暖欢呼我未贫,de'nuan'huan'hu'wo'wei'pin
得钱沽酒更无疑,de'qian'gu'jiu'geng'wu'yi
得钱相付何曾数,de'qian'xiang'fu'he'ceng'shu
德人抱衡石,de'ren'bao'heng'shi
德人无荆棘,de'ren'wu'jing'ji
得如虎挟乙,de'ru'hu'xie'yi
得丧悲欢反其故,de'sang'bei'huan'fan'qi'gu
得丧理本均,de'sang'li'ben'jun
得丧秋毫久已冥,de'sang'qiu'hao'jiu'yi'ming

得时何喜失时忧,de'shi'he'xi'shi'shi'you
得食无忧便可驯,de'shi'wu'you'bian'ke'xun

得之亡是叟,dei'zhi'wang'shi'sou

帝城如海欲寻难,di'cheng'ru'hai'yu'xun'nan
帝出乘昌运,di'chu'cheng'chang'yun

地僻居人少,di'pi'ju'ren'shao

对花不饮花应猜,dui'hua'bu'yin'hua'ying'cai
对花无信花应恨,dui'hua'wu'xin'hua'ying'hen

对酒思家愁老翁,dui'jiu'si'jia'chou'lao'weng
堆垅生坳窊,dui'long'sheng'ao'wa
对面一笑语,dui'mian'yi'xiao'yu
堆盘红缕细茵陈,dui'pan'hong'lv'xi'yin'chen

对形三人足,dui'xing'san'ren'zu

对扬初服改朱蓝,dui'yang'chu'fu'gai'zhu'lan

对御抽毫草帝纶,dui'yu'chou'hao'cao'di'lun
对玉山人虽老矣,dui'yu'shan'ren'sui'lao'yi
对月酣歌美清夜,dui'yue'han'ge'mei'qing'ye
对月句愈警,dui'yue'ju'yu'jing
对月题诗有几人,dui'yue'ti'shi'you'ji'ren
对之如灵均,dui'zhi'ru'ling'jun
对之食不饱,dui'zhi'shi'bu'bao
对子敢论诗,dui'zi'gan'lun'shi
钝根仍落箭锋机,dun'gen'reng'luo'jian'feng'ji
顿羸不可迁,dun'lei'bu'ke'qian

而作十年衰,er'zuo'shi'nian'shuai

发我一笑粲,fa'wo'yi'xiao'can
伐薪常冒崄,fa'xin'chang'mao'xian

法筵灵曜得重开,fa'yan'ling'yao'de'chong'kai

借禅以为诙,jie'chan'yi'wei'hui
嗟此本何常,jie'ci'ben'he'chang

居贫岂无食,ju'pin'qi'wu'shi
具区吞灭三州界,ju'qu'tun'mie'san'zhou'jie
举群寤而飞,ju'qun'wu'er'fei
居然成懒废,ju'ran'cheng'lan'fei
遽然虚玉座,ju'ran'xu'yu'zuo
居人送客西归处,ju'ren'song'ke'xi'gui'chu
居人特鲜少,ju'ren'te'xian'shao
居人行乐路人夸,ju'ren'xing'le'lu'ren'kua
聚散如飞禽,ju'san'ru'fei'qin
聚散如流萍,ju'san'ru'liu'ping
聚散实循环,ju'san'shi'xun'huan
聚散细思都是梦,ju'san'xi'si'dou'shi'meng
聚散行作风花瞥,ju'san'xing'zuo'feng'hua'pie
聚散一梦中,ju'san'yi'meng'zhong
居僧笑我恋清景,ju'seng'xiao'wo'lian'qing'jing
居僧语不繁,ju'seng'yu'bu'fan
举扇西风欲污人,ju'shan'xi'feng'yu'wu'ren
举觞还酩酊,ju'shang'hai'ming'ding
举觞瞩云汉,ju'shang'zhu'yun'han
举世不读易,ju'shi'bu'du'yi
居士常摧客,ju'shi'chang'cui'ke
举世但能旌隐逸,ju'shi'dan'neng'jing'yin'yi
举世皆同吾独异,ju'shi'jie'tong'wu'du'yi
居士老庞蕴,ju'shi'lao'pang'yun
居士身心如槁木,ju'shi'shen'xin'ru'gao'mu
居士无尘堪洗沐,ju'shi'wu'chen'kan'xi'mu
居士与我盖同耳,ju'shi'yu'wo'gai'tong'er
举世争称邺瓦坚,ju'shi'zheng'cheng'ye'wa'jian
举世知珍之,ju'shi'zhi'zhen'zhi
菊衰蛩亦蛰,ju'shuai'qiong'yi'zhe
拒霜黄菊为谁开,ju'shuang'huang'ju'wei'shui'kai
狙虽巧过人,ju'sui'qiao'guo'ren
菊潭饮伯始,ju'tan'yin'bo'shi
踞堂俯视何所有,ju'tang'fu'shi'he'suo'you
倨堂谁觉似非人,ju'tang'shui'jue'si'fei'ren
举头见客似长言,ju'tou'jian'ke'si'chang'yan
举头看山笏拄颊,ju'tou'kan'shan'hu'zhu'jia
举头三十六青山,ju'tou'san'shi'liu'qing'shan
举头双涕挥,ju'tou'shuang'ti'hui
举网惊呼得巨鱼,ju'wang'jing'hu'de'ju'yu
聚蚊金谷本何人,ju'wen'jin'gu'ben'he'ren
钜细本出相形中,ju'xi'ben'chu'xiang'xing'zhong
遽厌天庖膻,ju'yan'tian'pao'shan
钜野东倾淮泗满,ju'ye'dong'qing'huai'si'man
锯也解不解,ju'ye'jie'bu'jie
鞠衣亦令名,ju'yi'yi'ling'ming
举意欲従之,ju'yi'yu'cong'zhi
剧饮到参横,ju'yin'dao'can'heng
橘柚供南贡,ju'you'gong'nan'gong
俱有千里骨,ju'you'qian'li'gu
巨鱼暖更逃,ju'yu'nuan'geng'tao
遽与仙佛寂,ju'yu'xian'fo'ji
菊盏萸囊自古传,ju'zhan'yu'nang'zi'gu'chuan
居者莽谁容,ju'zhe'mang'shui'rong
举族贫兼病,ju'zu'pin'jian'bing
举族长悬似细腰,ju'zu'zhang'xuan'si'xi'yao
卷藏天禄吞石渠,juan'cang'tian'lu'tun'shi'qu
卷地风来忽吹散,juan'di'feng'lai'hu'chui'san
镌发亦已周,juan'fa'yi'yi'zhou
倦飞不拟控扶摇,juan'fei'bu'ni'kong'fu'yao
倦飞弱羽久知还,juan'fei'ruo'yu'jiu'zhi'hai
卷祴寄松萝,juan'gai'ji'song'luo
眷顾未云已,juan'gu'wei'yun'yi
眷眷不忍决,juan'juan'bu'ren'jue
卷卷长廊走黄叶,juan'juan'chang'lang'zou'huang'ye
娟娟到湖上,juan'juan'dao'hu'shang
娟娟峨眉月,juan'juan'e'mei'yue

涓涓泣露紫含笑,juan'juan'qi'lu'zi'han'xiao
眷眷岂属吾,juan'juan'qi'shu'wu

眷眷若有俟,juan'juan'ruo'you'si
娟娟霜月照生还,juan'juan'shuang'yue'zhao'sheng'hai
娟娟月上初,juan'juan'yue'shang'chu
娟娟云月稍侵轩,juan'juan'yun'yue'shao'qin'xuan
倦看涩勒暗蛮村,juan'kan'se'le'an'man'cun
倦看鶂鶂听呦呦,juan'kan'yi'yi'ting'you'you
倦客愁闻归路遥,juan'ke'chou'wen'gui'lu'yao
倦客登临无限思,juan'ke'deng'lin'wu'xian'si
卷壳而食病未能,juan'ke'er'shi'bing'wei'neng

卷帘那复似扬州,juan'lian'na'fu'si'yang'zhou

绝壁寒溪吼,jue'bi'han'xi'hou

绝伎世尝有,jue'ji'shi'chang'you

觉来落笔不经意,jue'lai'luo'bi'bu'jing'yi
觉来满眼是湖山,jue'lai'man'yan'shi'hu'shan
觉来烹石泉,jue'lai'peng'shi'quan
觉来如堕空,jue'lai'ru'duo'kong
觉来身世都是梦,jue'lai'shen'shi'dou'shi'meng

觉来信手笔已忘,jue'lai'xin'shou'bi'yi'wang
觉来已茫昧,jue'lai'yi'mang'mei

绝俗乃为学,jue'su'nai'wei'xue

绝学奈禽何,jue'xue'nai'qin'he

可使食无肉,ke'shi'shi'wu'rou

六辔去如组,liu'pei'qu'ru'zu
流萍阅人寰,liu'ping'yue'ren'huan
留气下暖脐,liu'qi'xia'nuan'qi
六桥横绝天汉上,liu'qiao'heng'jue'tian'han'shang
流泉无絃石无窍,liu'quan'wu'xian'shi'wu'qiao
六日不檐,liu'ri'bu'yan
柳色日夜暗,liu'se'ri'ye'an
流觞聚儿童,liu'shang'ju'er'tong
流觞曲水无多日,liu'shang'qu'shui'wu'duo'ri
六圣勤民计虑长,liu'sheng'qin'min'ji'lv'chang
刘生望都民,liu'sheng'wang'du'min
留诗不忍写,liu'shi'bu'ren'xie
六师纷未整,liu'shi'fen'wei'zheng
留诗河上慰离别,liu'shi'he'shang'wei'li'bie
六十青衫贫欲死,liu'shi'qing'shan'pin'yu'si
留师笋蕨不足道,liu'shi'sun'jue'bu'zu'dao
六十小劫风雨疾,liu'shi'xiao'jie'feng'yu'ji
刘氏宅边霜竹老,liu'shi'zhai'bian'shuang'zhu'lao
六书遂失指,liu'shu'sui'shi'zhi
六书篆籀数变改,liu'shu'zhuan'zhou'shu'bian'gai
流水随弦滑,liu'shui'sui'xian'hua
流水无情自入池,liu'shui'wu'qing'zi'ru'chi
流水夜自逆,liu'shui'ye'zi'ni
流水有令姿,liu'shui'you'ling'zi
流水在屋下,liu'shui'zai'wu'xia
柳丝低目晚庭空,liu'si'di'mu'wan'ting'kong
流澌争看浴冰川,liu'si'zheng'kan'yu'bing'chuan
流苏宝盖窥灵宇,liu'su'bao'gai'kui'ling'yu
柳虽无言不解愠,liu'sui'wu'yan'bu'jie'yun
流亡稍占田,liu'wang'shao'zhan'tian
流亡自栖止,liu'wang'zi'qi'zhi
留我闭门谁教汝,liu'wo'bi'men'shui'jiao'ru
留我过秋风,liu'wo'guo'qiu'feng
留我同行木上坐,liu'wo'tong'hang'mu'shang'zuo
留下高斋月明,liu'xia'gao'zhai'yue'ming
流涎露顶置不说,liu'xian'lu'ding'zhi'bu'shuo

留行终不果,liu'xing'zhong'bu'guo

柳絮飞时花满城,liu'xu'fei'shi'hua'man'cheng

六用都怀卷,liu'yong'dou'huai'juan
留与野人赓,liu'yu'ye'ren'geng

六载一经过,liu'zai'yi'jing'guo
六凿相攘妇争席,liu'zao'xiang'rang'fu'zheng'xi

六子岂可忘,liu'zi'qi'ke'wang

欺谩久成俗,qi'man'jiu'cheng'su
奇毛难藏果亦得,qi'mao'nan'cang'guo'yi'de
乞米使君舟,qi'mi'shi'jun'zhou
岂免跕堕忧,qi'mian'die'duo'you
岂免羁与缨,qi'mian'ji'yu'ying
欹眠露下舸,qi'mian'lu'xia'ge
欹眠随水转东垣,qi'mian'sui'shui'zhuan'dong'yuan
欹眠用半床,qi'mian'yong'ban'chuang
起灭篝灯拥燎炉,qi'mie'gou'deng'yong'liao'lu
桤木三年已足烧,qi'mu'san'nian'yi'zu'shao
其南背江,qi'nan'bei'jiang
岂能动高禅,qi'neng'dong'gao'chan
岂能济含生,qi'neng'ji'han'sheng
岂能苏一人,qi'neng'su'yi'ren
岂能无意冶城潮,qi'neng'wu'yi'ye'cheng'chao
七年来往我何堪,qi'nian'lai'wang'wo'he'kan
岂念苜蓿槃,qi'nian'mu'xu'pan
耆年日凋丧,qi'nian'ri'diao'sang
七年一别真如梦,qi'nian'yi'bie'zhen'ru'meng
祈年在好生,qi'nian'zai'hao'sheng
栖鸟亦惊起,qi'niao'yi'jing'qi
齐奴朝爨蜡,qi'nu'chao'cuan'la
妻孥怪骂归何时,qi'nu'guai'ma'gui'he'shi
妻孥恐怅望,qi'nu'kong'chang'wang
妻孥空四壁,qi'nu'kong'si'bi
妻孥莫忧色,qi'nu'mo'you'se
妻孥真敝履,qi'nu'zhen'bi'lv
岂其不怿兮将舍吾州,qi'qi'bu'yi'xi'jiang'she'wu'zhou
跂跂脉脉何等秩,qi'qi'mo'mo'he'deng'zhi

七千里外二毛人,qi'qian'li'wai'er'mao'ren
奇穷所向恶,qi'qiong'suo'xiang'e
崎岖草棘中,qi'qu'cao'ji'zhong
齐驱大道中,qi'qu'da'dao'zhong

崎岖好事人应笑,qi'qu'hao'shi'ren'ying'xiao

崎岖来野庙,qi'qu'lai'ye'miao
崎岖烂石上,qi'qu'lan'shi'shang
乞取摩尼照浊水,qi'qu'mo'ni'zhao'zhuo'shui
乞取千篇看俊逸,qi'qu'qian'pian'kan'jun'yi
弃去如脱屣,qi'qu'ru'tuo'xi
崎岖事节制,qi'qu'shi'jie'zhi
崎岖世路最先回,qi'qu'shi'lu'zui'xian'hui
崎岖拾松黄,qi'qu'shi'song'huang
崎岖世味尝应遍,qi'qu'shi'wei'chang'ying'bian
崎岖束蕴下荒径,qi'qu'shu'yun'xia'huang'jing
乞取微言继此声,qi'qu'wei'yan'ji'ci'sheng
崎岖欲取别,qi'qu'yu'qu'bie
崎岖真可笑,qi'qu'zhen'ke'xiao
崎岖走亭长,qi'qu'zou'ting'zhang
妻却差贤胜敬通,qi'que'cha'xian'sheng'jing'tong
颀然病鹤清而修,qi'ran'bing'he'qing'er'xiu
齐人爱公如子产,qi'ren'ai'gong'ru'zi'chan
其人勇且英,qi'ren'yong'qie'ying
岂如厩马好头赤,qi'ru'jiu'ma'hao'tou'chi
岂如千骑平时来,qi'ru'qian'qi'ping'shi'lai
岂如泉上僧,qi'ru'quan'shang'seng

岂如元君须见梦,qi'ru'yuan'jun'xu'jian'meng
七瑞寥落今何之,qi'rui'liao'luo'jin'he'zhi

气若凤与麟,qi'ruo'feng'yu'lin
岂若驾以行,qi'ruo'jia'yi'xing

气吞余子无全目,qi'tun'yu'zi'wu'quan'mu

入市胡眼碧,ru'shi'hu'yan'bi
如尸僵血喋,ru'shi'jiang'xue'die
汝师岂解言符命,ru'shi'qi'jie'yan'fu'ming
蓐食治野装,ru'shi'zhi'ye'zhuang

乳水满其腹,ru'shui'man'qi'fu
汝死那知世界宽,ru'si'na'zhi'shi'jie'kuan
如闻虫造哀,ru'wen'chong'zao'ai
孺文此日风流在,ru'wen'ci'ri'feng'liu'zai

如闻翕息可视效,ru'wen'xi'xi'ke'shi'xiao
如翁有几人,ru'weng'you'ji'ren

市无晨饮豚,shi'wu'chen'yin'tun
诗无定律君应将,shi'wu'ding'lv'jun'ying'jiang
世无阿房宫,shi'wu'e'pang'gong
实无负吏民,shi'wu'fu'li'min
十五年前此会同,shi'wu'nian'qian'ci'hui'tong
始悟三更雨如许,shi'wu'san'geng'yu'ru'xu
始悟山野姿,shi'wu'shan'ye'zi
始悟万缘虚,shi'wu'wan'yuan'xu
时无王良手,shi'wu'wang'liang'shou
世无西伯可能留,shi'wu'xi'bo'ke'neng'liu
事忤由然去,shi'wu'you'ran'qu
世无子有子,shi'wu'zi'you'zi
石犀金马世称神,shi'xi'jin'ma'shi'cheng'shen
士下其手,shi'xia'qi'shou
视下则有高,shi'xia'ze'you'gao
事贤友其仁,shi'xian'you'qi'ren
试向君砚求余波,shi'xiang'jun'yan'qiu'yu'bo
试向桑田问耦耕,shi'xiang'sang'tian'wen'ou'geng

试向诸生选何武,shi'xiang'zhu'sheng'xuan'he'wu
时向樽前说病翁,shi'xiang'zun'qian'shuo'bing'weng
世孝在持盈,shi'xiao'zai'chi'ying

时新满座闻名字,shi'xin'man'zuo'wen'ming'zi

诗新眇难和,shi'xin'miao'nan'he

失业安敢哭,shi'ye'an'gan'ku
时也独奈何,shi'ye'du'nai'he
食叶微虫真癣疥,shi'ye'wei'chong'zhen'xuan'jie
适野无心諠,shi'ye'wu'xin'xuan

施一当获千,shi'yi'dang'huo'qian

世亦贵其胆,shi'yi'gui'qi'dan
适意乃所祈,shi'yi'nai'suo'qi
食已宁复事,shi'yi'ning'fu'shi
时移事改应潸然,shi'yi'shi'gai'ying'shan'ran
师已忘言真有道,shi'yi'wang'yan'zhen'you'dao

是亦我所欲,shi'yi'wo'suo'yu

属镂无眼不识人,shu'lou'wu'yan'bu'shi'ren

我曹偶脱簿领闲,wo'cao'ou'tuo'bu'ling'xian
我曾为牛马,wo'ceng'wei'niu'ma
我尝好之每自笑,wo'chang'hao'zhi'mei'zi'xiao
我常携枕簟,wo'chang'xie'zhen'dian
我车既攻马亦同,wo'che'ji'gong'ma'yi'tong
我诚愚且拙,wo'cheng'yu'qie'zhuo
我持此石归,wo'chi'ci'shi'gui
我齿热以摇,wo'chi're'yi'yao
我池在人境,wo'chi'zai'ren'jing
我仇祝与苑,wo'chou'zhu'yu'yuan
我初従政见鲁叟,wo'chu'cong'zheng'jian'lu'sou
我除搜句百无功,wo'chu'sou'ju'bai'wu'gong
我初未识君,wo'chu'wei'shi'jun
我初无言说,wo'chu'wu'yan'shuo
卧吹箫管到扬州,wo'chui'xiao'guan'dao'yang'zhou
我従陈赵两欧阳,wo'cong'chen'zhao'liang'ou'yang
我従公游如一日,wo'cong'gong'you'ru'yi'ri
我従海外归,wo'cong'hai'wai'gui
我従庐山来,wo'cong'lu'shan'lai
我従山水窟中来,wo'cong'shan'shui'ku'zhong'lai
我当安所主,wo'dang'an'suo'zhu
我当畚锸先鲸髡,wo'dang'ben'cha'xian'jing'kun
我当凭轼与寓目,wo'dang'ping'shi'yu'yu'mu
握刀晚岁战刘郎,wo'dao'wan'sui'zhan'liu'lang
我得君砚亦安用,wo'de'jun'yan'yi'an'yong
我得会稽去,wo'de'kuai'ji'qu
我得生还雪髯满,wo'de'sheng'huan'xue'ran'man
我弟才将冠,wo'di'cai'jiang'guan
我独观此众妙门,wo'du'guan'ci'zhong'miao'men
我独唤酒杯,wo'du'huan'jiu'bei
我独倦请谒,wo'du'juan'qing'ye
我独怜君屋上乌,wo'du'lian'jun'wu'shang'wu
我读万卷书,wo'du'wan'juan'shu
我独形影相嬉娱,wo'du'xing'ying'xiang'xi'yu
我独种松柏,wo'du'zhong'song'bai
我尔皆天民,wo'er'jie'tian'min
我方北渡脱重江,wo'fang'bei'du'tuo'zhong'jiang
我方文葆中,wo'fang'wen'bao'zhong
我方执笔待,wo'fang'zhi'bi'dai
我非儿女萱,wo'fei'er'nv'xuan
我非个中人,wo'fei'ge'zhong'ren
我非羊叔子,wo'fei'yang'shu'zi
我歌归来引,wo'ge'gui'lai'yin
我歌且谣,wo'ge'qie'yao
我歌无有求,wo'ge'wu'you'qiu
我公抱绝识,wo'gong'bao'jue'shi
我公不出兮谁省吾忧,wo'gong'bu'chu'xi'shui'sheng'wu'you
我公古仙伯,wo'gong'gu'xian'bo
我公天与英雄表,wo'gong'tian'yu'ying'xiong'biao
我公厌富贵,wo'gong'yan'fu'gui
我观大瀛海,wo'guan'da'ying'hai
我观去来今,wo'guan'qu'lai'jin
我观人间世,wo'guan'ren'jian'shi
我官虽在朝,wo'guan'sui'zai'chao
我观文忠公,wo'guan'wen'zhong'gong
我观解语花,wo'guan'xie'yu'hua
我官于南今几时,wo'guan'yu'nan'jin'ji'shi
我归自南山,wo'gui'zi'nan'shan
我行本无事,wo'hang'ben'wu'shi
我行汴堤上,wo'hang'bian'di'shang
我行得所嗜,wo'hang'de'suo'shi
我行都是退之诗,wo'hang'dou'shi'tui'zhi'shi
我行忽失路,wo'hang'hu'shi'lu
我行忽至舜所藏,wo'hang'hu'zhi'shun'suo'cang
我行及初夏,wo'hang'ji'chu'xia
我行竟安之,wo'hang'jing'an'zhi
我行念西国,wo'hang'nian'xi'guo
我行日夜向江海,wo'hang'ri'ye'xiang'jiang'hai
我行适冬仲,wo'hang'shi'dong'zhong
我行虽有程,wo'hang'sui'you'cheng
我行天即雨,wo'hang'tian'ji'yu
我行畏人知,wo'hang'wei'ren'zhi
我行无迟速,wo'hang'wu'chi'su
我行无疾徐,wo'hang'wu'ji'xu
我行无南北,wo'hang'wu'nan'bei
我行无去留,wo'hang'wu'qu'liu
我行西北隅,wo'hang'xi'bei'yu
我何能度脱,wo'he'neng'du'tuo
我恨今犹在泥滓,wo'hen'jin'you'zai'ni'zi
我怀汝阴六一老,wo'huai'ru'yin'liu'yi'lao
我怀元祐初,wo'huai'yuan'you'chu
我记江边枯柳树,wo'ji'jiang'bian'ku'liu'shu
我计久已熟,wo'ji'jiu'yi'shu
我击藤床君唱歌,wo'ji'teng'chuang'jun'chang'ge
我家峨眉阴,wo'jia'e'mei'yin
我家衡山公,wo'jia'heng'shan'gong
我家江水初发源,wo'jia'jiang'shui'chu'fa'yuan
我家六男子,wo'jia'liu'nan'zi
我家岷蜀最高峰,wo'jia'min'shu'zui'gao'feng
我家天一方,wo'jia'tian'yi'fang
我家铜剑如赤蛇,wo'jia'tong'jian'ru'chi'she
我家韦布三百年,wo'jia'wei'bu'san'bai'nian
我家无田忧入室,wo'jia'wu'tian'you'ru'shi
我家真栗蓬,wo'jia'zhen'li'peng
我家拙厨膳,wo'jia'zhuo'chu'shan
蜗角空出缩,wo'jiao'kong'chu'suo
我今百日客,wo'jin'bai'ri'ke
我今不饮非不饮,wo'jin'bu'yin'fei'bu'yin
我今不作亦不止,wo'jin'bu'zuo'yi'bu'zhi
我今此别非他日,wo'jin'ci'bie'fei'ta'ri
我今独何幸,wo'jin'du'he'xing
我今反累生,wo'jin'fan'lei'sheng
我今废学不归山,wo'jin'fei'xue'bu'gui'shan
我今废学如寒竽,wo'jin'fei'xue'ru'han'yu
我今官正闲,wo'jin'guan'zheng'xian
我今号为二千石,wo'jin'hao'wei'er'qian'shi
我今况又百年后,wo'jin'kuang'you'bai'nian'hou
我今老病不出门,wo'jin'lao'bing'bu'chu'men
我今漂泊等鸿雁,wo'jin'piao'bo'deng'hong'yan
我今贫病长苦饥,wo'jin'pin'bing'chang'ku'ji
我今尚眷眷,wo'jin'shang'juan'juan
我今身世两相违,wo'jin'shen'shi'liang'xiang'wei
我今身世两悠悠,wo'jin'shen'shi'liang'you'you
我今四十二,wo'jin'si'shi'er
我今送米乞邻僧,wo'jin'song'mi'qi'lin'seng
我今停杯一问之,wo'jin'ting'bei'yi'wen'zhi
我今心似一潭月,wo'jin'xin'si'yi'tan'yue
我今亦过嵩山麓,wo'jin'yi'guo'song'shan'lu
我今已括囊,wo'jin'yi'kuo'nang
我今又复罹此旱,wo'jin'you'fu'li'ci'han
我今有说殆不然,wo'jin'you'shuo'dai'bu'ran
我旧门前客,wo'jiu'men'qian'ke
我久食官仓,wo'jiu'shi'guan'cang
我居其间啸且诺,wo'ju'qi'jian'xiao'qie'nuo
我居青空里,wo'ju'qing'kong'li
我倦承明苦求出,wo'juan'cheng'ming'ku'qiu'chu
我觉风雷真一噫,wo'jue'feng'lei'zhen'yi'yi
卧开桃李为谁妍,wo'kai'tao'li'wei'shui'yan
卧看椽烛高花摧,wo'kan'chuan'zhu'gao'hua'cui
我看繁讼频搔首,wo'kan'fan'song'pin'sao'shou
卧看古佛凌云阁,wo'kan'gu'fo'ling'yun'ge
卧看落月横千丈,wo'kan'luo'yue'heng'qian'zhang
卧看千帆落浅溪,wo'kan'qian'fan'luo'qian'xi
卧看秋山思洛阳,wo'kan'qiu'shan'si'luo'yang
卧看溪南十亩阴,wo'kan'xi'nan'shi'mu'yin
卧看萦帘一炷香,wo'kan'ying'lian'yi'zhu'xiang
卧看云烟变风雨,wo'kan'yun'yan'bian'feng'yu
卧看毡取盗,wo'kan'zhan'qu'dao
蜗壳卜居心自放,wo'ke'bo'ju'xin'zi'fang
我客二子间,wo'ke'er'zi'jian
我喟而作心未降,wo'kui'er'zuo'xin'wei'jiang
我愧真常也一班,wo'kui'zhen'chang'ye'yi'ban
我来不及见,wo'lai'bu'ji'jian
我来不忍去,wo'lai'bu'ren'qu
我来方醉后,wo'lai'fang'zui'hou
我来观政问风谣,wo'lai'guan'zheng'wen'feng'yao
我来黄冈下,wo'lai'huang'gang'xia
我来金山更留宿,wo'lai'jin'shan'geng'liu'su
我来叩石户,wo'lai'kou'shi'hu
我来秋日午,wo'lai'qiu'ri'wu
我来取酒酹先生,wo'lai'qu'jiu'lei'xian'sheng
我来适过雨,wo'lai'shi'guo'yu
我来属无事,wo'lai'shu'wu'shi
我来无时节,wo'lai'wu'shi'jie
我来喜共阿戎语,wo'lai'xi'gong'a'rong'yu
我来徙倚长松下,wo'lai'xi'yi'chang'song'xia
我来闲濯足,wo'lai'xian'zhuo'zu
我来已百日,wo'lai'yi'bai'ri
我来亦何事,wo'lai'yi'he'shi
我来以丧归,wo'lai'yi'sang'gui
我来辄问法,wo'lai'zhe'wen'fa
我来仲夏初,wo'lai'zhong'xia'chu
我老安能为,wo'lao'an'neng'wei
我老惫先止,wo'lao'bei'xian'zhi
我老不堪歌乐职,wo'lao'bu'kan'ge'le'zhi
我老不看书,wo'lao'bu'kan'shu
我老不饮当付君,wo'lao'bu'yin'dang'fu'jun
我老不自惜,wo'lao'bu'zi'xi
我老此身无着处,wo'lao'ci'shen'wu'zhuo'chu
我老得全犹社栎,wo'lao'de'quan'you'she'li
我老多遗忘,wo'lao'duo'yi'wang
我老废吟哦,wo'lao'fei'yin'o

我老人间万事休,wo'lao'ren'jian'wan'shi'xiu

我老书益放,wo'lao'shu'yi'fang
我老忘家舍,wo'lao'wang'jia'she
我老心已灰,wo'lao'xin'yi'hui
我老众所易,wo'lao'zhong'suo'yi
我泪犹可拭,wo'lei'you'ke'shi
卧理讼随息,wo'li'song'sui'xi
我聊尔耳君其漫,wo'liao'er'er'jun'qi'man
我廪何时高,wo'lin'he'shi'gao
我留侍玉坐,wo'liu'shi'yu'zuo
卧龙蟠屈半东州,wo'long'pan'qu'ban'dong'zhou
我马亦款矻,wo'ma'yi'kuan'ku
我梦君见之,wo'meng'jun'jian'zhi

我命不在天,wo'ming'bu'zai'tian
我名公字偶相同,wo'ming'gong'zi'ou'xiang'tong
我能未到说黄州,wo'neng'wei'dao'shuo'huang'zhou
我年二十无朋俦,wo'nian'er'shi'wu'peng'chou
我念老退者,wo'nian'lao'tui'zhe
我癖良可赎,wo'pi'liang'ke'shu
我疲学更误,wo'pi'xue'geng'wu
我贫如饥鼠,wo'pin'ru'ji'shu

我岂不足欤,wo'qi'bu'zu'yu
我岂无长镵,wo'qi'wu'chang'chan
我岂轩冕人,wo'qi'xuan'mian'ren
我墙东北隅,wo'qiang'dong'bei'yu
我琴终不败,wo'qin'zhong'bu'bai
我顷尝独游,wo'qing'chang'du'you
我顷分符在东武,wo'qing'fen'fu'zai'dong'wu

我穷惟四壁,wo'qiong'wei'si'bi
我穷真有数,wo'qiong'zhen'you'shu
我穷正与君仿佛,wo'qiong'zheng'yu'jun'fang'fu
我如此水千山底,wo'ru'ci'shui'qian'shan'di
我如废井久不食,wo'ru'fei'jing'jiu'bu'shi
我如更拣择,wo'ru'geng'jian'ze
我如怀祖拙自谋,wo'ru'huai'zu'zhuo'zi'mou
我如逆旅当去客,wo'ru'ni'lv'dang'qu'ke
我若真是我,wo'ruo'zhen'shi'wo
我散而卑之,wo'san'er'bei'zhi
卧沙细肋吾方厌,wo'sha'xi'lei'wu'fang'yan
我善孰相我,wo'shan'shu'xiang'wo
我上朝元春半老,wo'shang'chao'yuan'chun'ban'lao
我少即多难,wo'shao'ji'duo'nan
我少知子由,wo'shao'zhi'zi'you
我身牛穿鼻,wo'shen'niu'chuan'bi
我生百事不挂眼,wo'sheng'bai'shi'bu'gua'yan
我生百事常随缘,wo'sheng'bai'shi'chang'sui'yuan
我生本艰奇,wo'sheng'ben'jian'qi
我生本强鄙,wo'sheng'ben'qiang'bi
我生本自便江海,wo'sheng'ben'zi'bian'jiang'hai
我生不有命,wo'sheng'bu'you'ming
我生乘化日夜逝,wo'sheng'cheng'hua'ri'ye'shi
我生纷纷婴百缘,wo'sheng'fen'fen'ying'bai'yuan
我生固多忧,wo'sheng'gu'duo'you
我生孤癖本无邻,wo'sheng'gu'pi'ben'wu'lin
我生祸患久不择,wo'sheng'huo'huan'jiu'bu'ze
我生几冬至,wo'sheng'ji'dong'zhi
我生类如此,wo'sheng'lei'ru'ci
我生飘荡去何求,wo'sheng'piao'dang'qu'he'qiu
我生岂有终,wo'sheng'qi'you'zhong
我生日皇皇,wo'sheng'ri'huang'huang
我生如飞蓬,wo'sheng'ru'fei'peng
我生如寄良畸孤,wo'sheng'ru'ji'liang'ji'gu
我生三度别,wo'sheng'san'du'bie
我生涉世本为口,wo'sheng'she'shi'ben'wei'kou
我生涉忧患,wo'sheng'she'you'huan
我生天地间,wo'sheng'tian'di'jian
我生天地一闲物,wo'sheng'tian'di'yi'xian'wu
我生托子以为命,wo'sheng'tuo'zi'yi'wei'ming
我生无田食破砚,wo'sheng'wu'tian'shi'po'yan
我生亦何须,wo'sheng'yi'he'xu
我生有定数,wo'sheng'you'ding'shu
我是非文殊,wo'shi'fei'wen'shu
我是江南旧游客,wo'shi'jiang'nan'jiu'you'ke
我是胶西旧使君,wo'shi'jiao'xi'jiu'shi'jun
卧室经旬减带围,wo'shi'jing'xun'jian'dai'wei
我诗久不作,wo'shi'jiu'bu'zuo
我时来周览,wo'shi'lai'zhou'lan
我识南屏金鲫鱼,wo'shi'nan'ping'jin'ji'yu
我时年尚幼,wo'shi'nian'shang'you
我师宁与蘧,wo'shi'ning'yu'qu
我时匹马江西东,wo'shi'pi'ma'jiang'xi'dong
我是骑鲸手,wo'shi'qi'jing'shou
我视去来皆梦尔,wo'shi'qu'lai'jie'meng'er
我诗如病骥,wo'shi'ru'bing'ji
我是识字耕田夫,wo'shi'shi'zi'geng'tian'fu
我室思无邪,wo'shi'si'wu'xie
我诗虽云拙,wo'shi'sui'yun'zhuo
我诗为闲作,wo'shi'wei'xian'zuo
我诗无杰句,wo'shi'wu'jie'ju
我是小乘僧,wo'shi'xiao'cheng'seng
我时移守古河东,wo'shi'yi'shou'gu'he'dong
我时羽服黄楼上,wo'shi'yu'fu'huang'lou'shang
我是玉堂仙,wo'shi'yu'tang'xian
我时与子皆儿童,wo'shi'yu'zi'jie'er'tong
我是朱陈旧使君,wo'shi'zhu'chen'jiu'shi'jun
我时醉眠风林下,wo'shi'zui'mian'feng'lin'xia
握手百忧空往事,wo'shou'bai'you'kong'wang'shi
握手但悲辛,wo'shou'dan'bei'xin
握手更知禅迫远,wo'shou'geng'zhi'chan'po'yuan
握手宁知无贺监,wo'shou'ning'zhi'wu'he'jian
握手山林复怅然,wo'shou'shan'lin'fu'chang'ran
握手笑言如昨日,wo'shou'xiao'yan'ru'zuo'ri
握手一笑三千年,wo'shou'yi'xiao'san'qian'nian
握手一笑未为辱,wo'shou'yi'xiao'wei'wei'ru
握手祝君能强饭,wo'shou'zhu'jun'neng'qiang'fan
卧树独秀桄榔园,wo'shu'du'xiu'guang'lang'yuan
我书意造本无法,wo'shu'yi'zao'ben'wu'fa
我衰此果复易朽,wo'shuai'ci'guo'fu'yi'xiu
我衰废学懒且媮,wo'shuai'fei'xue'lan'qie'tou
我衰寄江湖,wo'shuai'ji'jiang'hu
我衰临政多缪错,wo'shuai'lin'zheng'duo'miu'cuo
我衰且病君亦穷,wo'shuai'qie'bing'jun'yi'qiong
我衰正伏枥,wo'shuai'zheng'fu'li
我似枯桑不受条,wo'si'ku'sang'bu'shou'tiao
我似老牛鞭不动,wo'si'lao'niu'bian'bu'dong
我似乐天君记取,wo'si'le'tian'jun'ji'qu
我思其由岂坐悭,wo'si'qi'you'qi'zuo'qian
我思谁能谋,wo'si'shui'neng'mou
我虽爱山亦自笑,wo'sui'ai'shan'yi'zi'xiao
我虽不解饮,wo'sui'bu'jie'yin
我虽不饮强倒卮,wo'sui'bu'yin'qiang'dao'zhi
我虽穷苦不如人,wo'sui'qiong'ku'bu'ru'ren
我岁岁兮来游,wo'sui'sui'xi'lai'you
我虽作郡古云乐,wo'sui'zuo'jun'gu'yun'le
我所思兮在彭蠡,wo'suo'si'xi'zai'peng'li
我堂德有邻,wo'tang'de'you'lin
我田方寸耕不尽,wo'tian'fang'cun'geng'bu'jin
我田荆溪上,wo'tian'jing'xi'shang
卧听窗风泠,wo'ting'chuang'feng'ling
卧听风鸾鸣铁凤,wo'ting'feng'luan'ming'tie'feng
卧听风漪声满榻,wo'ting'feng'yi'sheng'man'ta
卧听饥龙吟,wo'ting'ji'long'yin
卧听鸡鸣粥熟时,wo'ting'ji'ming'zhou'shu'shi
卧听空阶环玦响,wo'ting'kong'jie'huan'jue'xiang
卧听邻寺钟,wo'ting'lin'si'zhong
卧听墙东人响屐,wo'ting'qiang'dong'ren'xiang'ji
卧听秋声落竟悭,wo'ting'qiu'sheng'luo'jing'qian
卧听使君鸣鼓角,wo'ting'shi'jun'ming'gu'jiao
卧听谡谡碎龙鳞,wo'ting'su'su'sui'long'lin
卧听萧萧雨打窗,wo'ting'xiao'xiao'yu'da'chuang
渥洼故自千里足,wo'wa'gu'zi'qian'li'zu
我晚得王孙,wo'wan'de'wang'sun
我往求之,wo'wang'qiu'zhi
我为半日稽,wo'wei'ban'ri'ji
我为林下客,wo'wei'lin'xia'ke
我为乃翁留十日,wo'wei'nai'weng'liu'shi'ri
卧闻百舌呼春风,wo'wen'bai'she'hu'chun'feng
卧闻禅老入南山,wo'wen'chan'lao'ru'nan'shan
我闻大梵天,wo'wen'da'fan'tian
卧闻点滴如秋雨,wo'wen'dian'di'ru'qiu'yu
卧闻风幔落蛜蝛,wo'wen'feng'man'luo'yi'wei
卧闻归路乐声长,wo'wen'gui'lu'yue'sheng'chang
卧闻海棠花,wo'wen'hai'tang'hua
卧闻龁草风雨声,wo'wen'he'cao'feng'yu'sheng
卧闻黄栗留,wo'wen'huang'li'liu
卧闻客至倒屣迎,wo'wen'ke'zhi'dao'xi'ying
卧闻铙鼓送归艎,wo'wen'nao'gu'song'gui'huang
我闻其来喜欲舞,wo'wen'qi'lai'xi'yu'wu
卧闻榕叶响长廊,wo'wen'rong'ye'xiang'chang'lang
卧闻三老白事,wo'wen'san'lao'bai'shi
卧闻疏响梧桐雨,wo'wen'shu'xiang'wu'tong'yu
卧闻邮签报水程,wo'wen'you'qian'bao'shui'cheng
我卧读书牛不知,wo'wo'du'shu'niu'bu'zhi
我无丹白知如梦,wo'wu'dan'bai'zhi'ru'meng
我屋公墩在眼中,wo'wu'gong'dun'zai'yan'zhong
我无我不二,wo'wu'wo'bu'er
我无谪仙句,wo'wu'zhe'xian'ju
我昔长安见此画,wo'xi'chang'an'jian'ci'hua
我昔尝为径山客,wo'xi'chang'wei'jing'shan'ke
我昔家居断还往,wo'xi'jia'ju'duan'hai'wang
我昔南行舟击汴,wo'xi'nan'xing'zhou'ji'bian
我昔少年日,wo'xi'shao'nian'ri
我昔识子自武功,wo'xi'shi'zi'zi'wu'gong
我昔在东武,wo'xi'zai'dong'wu
我昔在田间,wo'xi'zai'tian'jian
我闲方缓觞,wo'xian'fang'huan'shang
蜗涎上彩楹,wo'xian'shang'cai'ying
卧想春瓮泣,wo'xiang'chun'weng'qi
我相夫子非癯仙,wo'xiang'fu'zi'fei'qu'xian
我笑刘伯伦,wo'xiao'liu'bo'lun
我笑陶渊明,wo'xiao'tao'yuan'ming
我笑谓翁儿更贤,wo'xiao'wei'weng'er'geng'xian
我笑吴人不好事,wo'xiao'wu'ren'bu'hao'shi
我谢江神岂得已,wo'xie'jiang'shen'qi'de'yi
我心本如此,wo'xin'ben'ru'ci
我心久已降,wo'xin'jiu'yi'jiang
我心空无物,wo'xin'kong'wu'wu
我心西悲,wo'xin'xi'bei
我心则喜,wo'xin'ze'xi
我性不饮只解醉,wo'xing'bu'yin'zhi'jie'zui
我行其野,wo'xing'qi'ye
我兴为嗟咨,wo'xing'wei'jie'zi
我性喜临水,wo'xing'xi'lin'shui
我兄瑚琏姿,wo'xiong'hu'lian'zi
我兄绿发蔚如故,wo'xiong'lv'fa'wei'ru'gu
我兄清庙器,wo'xiong'qing'miao'qi
我言宁复従,wo'yan'ning'fu'cong
我言岁在东,wo'yan'sui'zai'dong
沃野便到桑麻川,wo'ye'bian'dao'sang'ma'chuan
我以病杜门,wo'yi'bing'du'men
我以此名为,wo'yi'ci'ming'wei
我亦従来识英物,wo'yi'cong'lai'shi'ying'wu
我亦带脱巾欹宽,wo'yi'dai'tuo'jin'qi'kuan
我亦吊文园,wo'yi'diao'wen'yuan
我亦儿嬉作小诗,wo'yi'er'xi'zuo'xiao'shi
我亦归瞢腾,wo'yi'gui'meng'teng
我已横江击素波,wo'yi'heng'jiang'ji'su'bo
我亦化人来,wo'yi'hua'ren'lai
我亦饥肠夜自呼,wo'yi'ji'chang'ye'zi'hu
我亦继华躅,wo'yi'ji'hua'zhu
我亦季孟山玄卿,wo'yi'ji'meng'shan'xuan'qing
我亦江海人,wo'yi'jiang'hai'ren
我亦江南五见春,wo'yi'jiang'nan'wu'jian'chun
我亦仅免为鱼鼋,wo'yi'jin'mian'wei'yu'yuan
我忆荆溪山最乐,wo'yi'jing'xi'shan'zui'le
我亦倦游者,wo'yi'juan'you'zhe
我已开榛得茯苓,wo'yi'kai'zhen'de'fu'ling
我亦困诗酒,wo'yi'kun'shi'jiu
我亦来寻桑枣村,wo'yi'lai'xun'sang'zao'cun
我亦老宾客,wo'yi'lao'bin'ke
我亦老且病,wo'yi'lao'qie'bing
我亦暮年专一壑,wo'yi'mu'nian'zhuan'yi'he
我已迫旅酬,wo'yi'po'lv'chou
我亦旗鼓严中军,wo'yi'qi'gu'yan'zhong'jun
我亦岂久长,wo'yi'qi'jiu'chang
我挹其清久未竭,wo'yi'qi'qing'jiu'wei'jie
我亦散发虚明轩,wo'yi'san'fa'xu'ming'xuan
我亦涉万里,wo'yi'she'wan'li
我亦世味薄,wo'yi'shi'wei'bao
我亦寿使君,wo'yi'shou'shi'jun
我意殊未阑,wo'yi'shu'wei'lan
我已无可言,wo'yi'wu'ke'yan
我亦无所求,wo'yi'wu'suo'qiu
我亦淹留岂长算,wo'yi'yan'liu'qi'chang'suan
我已有馀彼不足,wo'yi'you'yu'bi'bu'zu
我亦沾沛渥,wo'yi'zhan'pei'wo
我亦真堂作记人,wo'yi'zhen'tang'zuo'ji'ren
我意正麋鹿,wo'yi'zheng'mi'lu
我亦坐念高安客,wo'yi'zuo'nian'gao'an'ke
我亦坐视心瞢瞢,wo'yi'zuo'shi'xin'meng'meng
我饮不尽器,wo'yin'bu'jin'qi
我引而高之,wo'yin'er'gao'zhi
我饮如弈棋,wo'yin'ru'yi'qi
我有长头儿,wo'you'chang'tou'er
我有方外客,wo'you'fang'wai'ke
我友顾子敦,wo'you'gu'zi'dun
我游鉴空阁,wo'you'jian'kong'ge
我游江湖上,wo'you'jiang'hu'shang
我游兰溪访清泉,wo'you'lan'xi'fang'qing'quan
我游清颍尾,wo'you'qing'ying'wei
我有夙鸣枝,wo'you'su'ming'zhi
我有桐马手自提,wo'you'tong'ma'shou'zi'ti
我有同舍郎,wo'you'tong'she'lang
我有万株菊,wo'you'wan'zhu'ju
我有一瓢酒,wo'you'yi'piao'jiu
我有一言能决疣,wo'you'yi'yan'neng'jue'you
我有至味非煎烹,wo'you'zhi'wei'fei'jian'peng
我友自杭来,wo'you'zi'hang'lai
我欲嗔小儿,wo'yu'chen'xiao'er
我欲乘飞车,wo'yu'cheng'fei'che
我欲从之倦游徙,wo'yu'cong'zhi'juan'you'xi
我欲従之语,wo'yu'cong'zhi'yu
我欲东南去,wo'yu'dong'nan'qu
我欲访甘露,wo'yu'fang'gan'lu
我欲歌杕杜,wo'yu'ge'duo'du
我欲归休君未可,wo'yu'gui'xiu'jun'wei'ke
我欲归休瑟渐希,wo'yu'gui'xiu'se'jian'xi
我欲归寻万里桥,wo'yu'gui'xun'wan'li'qiao
我欲呼之立坐隅,wo'yu'hu'zhi'li'zuo'yu
我欲江东去,wo'yu'jiang'dong'qu
我欲巾笥蓄,wo'yu'jin'si'xu
我语客徒尔,wo'yu'ke'tu'er
我欲眠矣君归休,wo'yu'mian'yi'jun'gui'xiu
我欲弃官重问道,wo'yu'qi'guan'zhong'wen'dao
我欲迁其庙,wo'yu'qian'qi'miao
我欲然犀看,wo'yu'ran'xi'kan
我欲食其膏,wo'yu'shi'qi'gao
我与世疏宜独往,wo'yu'shi'shu'yi'du'wang
我欲它时看事功,wo'yu'ta'shi'kan'shi'gong
我语听者谁,wo'yu'ting'zhe'shui
我欲往沧海,wo'yu'wang'cang'hai
我欲西归卜邻舍,wo'yu'xi'gui'bo'lin'she
我欲仙山掇瑶草,wo'yu'xian'shan'duo'yao'cao
我欲携壶就君饮,wo'yu'xie'hu'jiu'jun'yin
我欲寻之不惮远,wo'yu'xun'zhi'bu'dan'yuan
我欲赢粮往问道,wo'yu'ying'liang'wang'wen'dao
卧雨幽花无限思,wo'yu'you'hua'wu'xian'si
我欲折繻留此老,wo'yu'zhe'ru'liu'ci'lao
我欲自汝阴,wo'yu'zi'ru'yin
我欲走南涧,wo'yu'zou'nan'jian
我愿卜邻非一日,wo'yuan'bo'lin'fei'yi'ri
我愿得全如苦李,wo'yuan'de'quan'ru'ku'li
我愿焚囊钵,wo'yuan'fen'nang'bo
我愿适在兹,wo'yuan'shi'zai'zi
我愿天公怜赤子,wo'yuan'tian'gong'lian'chi'zi
我愿铜山化南亩,wo'yuan'tong'shan'hua'nan'mu
我愿偕秋风,wo'yuan'xie'qiu'feng
卧云行归休,wo'yun'xing'gui'xiu

我在东坡下,wo'zai'dong'po'xia
我在黄楼上,wo'zai'huang'lou'shang
我在钱塘六百日,wo'zai'qian'tang'liu'bai'ri
我在钱塘拓湖渌,wo'zai'qian'tang'tuo'hu'lu
我憎孟郊诗,wo'zeng'meng'jiao'shi
我谪黄冈四五年,wo'zhe'huang'gang'si'wu'nian
卧枕纶巾酒新漉,wo'zhen'guan'jin'jiu'xin'lu
卧枕雷车踏阴轴,wo'zhen'lei'che'ta'yin'zhou
我正含毫紫微阁,wo'zheng'han'hao'zi'wei'ge
我正买龚牛,wo'zheng'mai'gong'niu
卧治何妨昼掩门,wo'zhi'he'fang'zhou'yan'men
我之怀矣,wo'zhi'huai'yi
我知君不然,wo'zhi'jun'bu'ran
我知视成,wo'zhi'shi'cheng
我知思故乡,wo'zhi'si'gu'xiang
我知新亭望云好,wo'zhi'xin'ting'wang'yun'hao
卧治雍容已百年,wo'zhi'yong'rong'yi'bai'nian
我止雨还住,wo'zhi'yu'hai'zhu
我终不嗔渠,wo'zhong'bu'chen'qu
我舟何时发,wo'zhou'he'shi'fa
我舟下清淮,wo'zhou'xia'qing'huai
我州贤将知人劳,wo'zhou'xian'jiang'zhi'ren'lao
我酌徐徐不满觥,wo'zhuo'xu'xu'bu'man'gong
我自广陵归,wo'zi'guang'ling'gui
我自怀私欣所便,wo'zi'huai'si'xin'suo'bian
我子乃散材,wo'zi'nai'san'cai
我自飘零是羁旅,wo'zi'piao'ling'shi'ji'lv
我自日月谁使吞,wo'zi'ri'yue'shui'shi'tun
我自兴尽回酒船,wo'zi'xing'jin'hui'jiu'chuan
我自有云持寄君,wo'zi'you'yun'chi'ji'jun
我醉都不知,wo'zui'dou'bu'zhi
我醉而嬉欲仙去,wo'zui'er'xi'yu'xian'qu
我醉方不啜,wo'zui'fang'bu'chuo
我醉君且去,wo'zui'jun'qie'qu
我醉欲眠君罢休,wo'zui'yu'mian'jun'ba'xiu
我作黄石翁,wo'zuo'huang'shi'weng
我坐名过实,wo'zuo'ming'guo'shi
我作西园诗,wo'zuo'xi'yuan'shi
我作遗直诗,wo'zuo'yi'zhi'shi
五霸之所运,wu'ba'zhi'suo'yun
五百年间谁复在,wu'bai'nian'jian'shui'fu'zai
五百年间异人出,wu'bai'nian'jian'yi'ren'chu

悟彼良自咍,wu'bi'liang'zi'hai
悟彼善知识,wu'bi'shan'zhi'shi

午餐便一肉,wu'can'bian'yi'rou
吾曹二三事,wu'cao'er'san'shi
吾策殊未良,wu'ce'shu'wei'liang
吾侪便归老,wu'chai'bian'gui'lao
吾侪非二物,wu'chai'fei'er'wu

吾侪岂独坐多言,wu'chai'qi'du'zuo'duo'yan
吾侪相对复三人,wu'chai'xiang'dui'fu'san'ren
吾侪小人但饱饭,wu'chai'xiao'ren'dan'bao'fan
吾侪一醉岂易得,wu'chai'yi'zui'qi'yi'de
吾侪犹健可频倾,wu'chai'you'jian'ke'pin'qing
武昌官柳年年好,wu'chang'guan'liu'nian'nian'hao
武昌官柳知谁栽,wu'chang'guan'liu'zhi'shui'zai
吾尝奇华佗,wu'chang'qi'hua'tuo
误长清谈助世纷,wu'chang'qing'tan'zhu'shi'fen

吴潮不到武昌宫,wu'chao'bu'dao'wu'chang'gong
五车不再读,wu'che'bu'zai'du
五车书独负家声,wu'che'shu'du'fu'jia'sheng

无成空得懒,wu'cheng'kong'de'lan
乌程霜稻袭人香,wu'cheng'shuang'dao'xi'ren'xiang

悟此知有命,wu'ci'zhi'you'ming

无动行善行,wu'dong'xing'shan'xing

五更春枕梦春韶,wu'geng'chun'zhen'meng'chun'shao
五更缥缈千山月,wu'geng'piao'miao'qian'shan'yue

要须纵牛羊,yao'xu'zong'niu'yang

遥瞻季行役,yao'zhan'ji'xing'yi

已作飞腾变化看,yi'zuo'fei'teng'bian'hua'kan
已作观鱼槛,yi'zuo'guan'yu'kan
已作蝴蝶飞联翩,yi'zuo'hu'die'fei'lian'pian
已作湖阴客,yi'zuo'hu'yin'ke
亦作蒲萄绿,yi'zuo'pu'tao'lv
已作人间白发翁,yi'zuo'ren'jian'bai'fa'weng
已作霜风九月寒,yi'zuo'shuang'feng'jiu'yue'han
忆昨踏雪度长安,yi'zuo'ta'xue'du'chang'an
已作太饱计,yi'zuo'tai'bao'ji
已作萧条岁暮心,yi'zuo'xiao'tiao'sui'mu'xin
已坐迂疏来此地,yi'zuo'yu'shu'lai'ci'di
引杯看剑坐生风,yin'bei'kan'jian'zuo'sheng'feng
引杯看剑坐生光,yin'bei'kan'jian'zuo'sheng'guang
银杯逐马带随车,yin'bei'zhu'ma'dai'sui'che
因病得闲殊不恶,yin'bing'de'xian'shu'bu'e
茵陈甘菊不负渠,yin'chen'gan'ju'bu'fu'qu
吟成超然诗,yin'cheng'chao'ran'shi
殷床闻夜舂,yin'chuang'wen'ye'chong
荫此九月暑,yin'ci'jiu'yue'shu

阴德故应多後福,yin'de'gu'ying'duo'hou'fu

应在孤云落照边,ying'zai'gu'yun'luo'zhao'bian
应真飞锡过,ying'zhen'fei'xi'guo
应知客路愁无奈,ying'zhi'ke'lu'chou'wu'nai
应知时命不关身,ying'zhi'shi'ming'bu'guan'shen
应知为物使,ying'zhi'wei'wu'shi
应知我是香案吏,ying'zhi'wo'shi'xiang'an'li
影中楼阁见青朱,ying'zhong'lou'ge'jian'qing'zhu
应逐嫦娥驾老蟾,ying'zhu'chang'e'jia'lao'chan
英姿连璧従多士,ying'zi'lian'bi'cong'duo'shi
英姿凛以寒,ying'zi'lin'yi'han
应作羲之羡怀祖,ying'zuo'xi'zhi'xian'huai'zu
用笔乃其天,yong'bi'nai'qi'tian
拥鼻一长谣,yong'bi'yi'chang'yao
用此较得丧,yong'ci'jiao'de'sang
永辞角上两蛮触,yong'ci'jiao'shang'liang'man'chu
用此顽且丑,yong'ci'wan'qie'chou
用此委曲情,yong'ci'wei'qu'qing
佣儿贩妇皆冰玉,yong'er'fan'fu'jie'bing'yu
拥褐横眠天未明,yong'he'heng'mian'tian'wei'ming
拥褐坐睡依团蒲,yong'he'zuo'shui'yi'tuan'pu
永怀茶山下,yong'huai'cha'shan'xia
永怀从晤歌,yong'huai'cong'wu'ge

永怀江阳叟,yong'huai'jiang'yang'sou

永怀前事不自适,yong'huai'qian'shi'bu'zi'shi

永寄槁木形,yong'ji'gao'mu'xing
拥髻无言怨未归,yong'ji'wu'yan'yuan'wei'gui

涌金门外看,yong'jin'men'wai'kan

勇决凡几个,yong'jue'fan'ji'ge

饔人改膳羞,yong'ren'gai'shan'xiu

永随二子脱讥谗,yong'sui'er'zi'tuo'ji'chan

幽人一友吾得尚,you'ren'yi'you'wu'de'shang
幽人隐几寂无语,you'ren'yin'ji'ji'wu'yu
游人杂楚蜀,you'ren'za'chu'shu
幽人正独乐,you'ren'zheng'du'le
幽人只采黄精去,you'ren'zhi'cai'huang'jing'qu

游人中道忽不返,you'ren'zhong'dao'hu'bu'fan

有如市倡抹青红,you'ru'shi'chang'mo'qing'hong
有如兔走鹰隼落,you'ru'tu'zou'ying'sun'luo
又如学医人,you'ru'xue'yi'ren
有如扬子云,you'ru'yang'zi'yun
有如袁伯业,you'ru'yuan'bo'ye
有如醉且坠,you'ru'zui'qie'zhui
有若大颠者,you'ruo'da'dian'zhe
又若廉夫心,you'ruo'lian'fu'xin
有三即有四,you'san'ji'you'si
忧色常在眉,you'se'chang'zai'mei
有僧闭门手自栽,you'seng'bi'men'shou'zi'zai
有山秃如赭,you'shan'tu'ru'zhe
有甚观骈胁,you'shen'guan'pian'xie
犹胜白门穷吕布,you'sheng'bai'men'qiong'lv'bu
有生常寂寞,you'sheng'chang'ji'mo
犹胜尘土走章台,you'sheng'chen'tu'zou'zhang'tai
有生共处覆载内,you'sheng'gong'chu'fu'zai'nei
犹胜汉宫悲婕妤,you'sheng'han'gong'bei'jie'yu
有生何处不安生,you'sheng'he'chu'bu'an'sheng
犹胜嵇叔夜,you'sheng'ji'shu'ye
犹胜江左狂灵运,you'sheng'jiang'zuo'kuang'ling'yun
犹胜人间曲,you'sheng'ren'jian'qu
犹胜相逢不相识,you'sheng'xiang'feng'bu'xiang'shi
有生寓大块,you'sheng'yu'da'kuai
有绳于防兮有畚于沟,you'sheng'yu'fang'xi'you'ben'yu'gou
又胜楂梨酢,you'sheng'zha'li'zuo
有施惭子仁,you'shi'can'zi'ren
又试曹溪一勺甘,you'shi'cao'xi'yi'shao'gan
犹是当时乞祭人,you'shi'dang'shi'qi'ji'ren
犹事萼绿华,you'shi'e'lv'hua
有事径须烦一怒,you'shi'jing'xu'fan'yi'nu
有时客至亦为酌,you'shi'ke'zhi'yi'wei'zhuo
幽事略能知,you'shi'lue'neng'zhi
有时仍丹丘,you'shi'reng'dan'qiu
忧时虽早白,you'shi'sui'zao'bai
犹是西江老蛟血,you'shi'xi'jiang'lao'jiao'xue
右手持杯左捧颐,you'shou'chi'bei'zuo'peng'yi
有水浊如泔,you'shui'zhuo'ru'gan
又说当产子,you'shuo'dang'chan'zi
有似不饮观酒狂,you'si'bu'yin'guan'jiu'kuang
犹思对案笔生风,you'si'dui'an'bi'sheng'feng
有似赴壑蛇,you'si'fu'he'she
犹似浮江老阿童,you'si'fu'jiang'lao'a'tong
有司还欲选方闻,you'si'hai'yu'xuan'fang'wen
犹似汉江清,you'si'han'jiang'qing
犹思理烟艇,you'si'li'yan'ting
有似钱塘江上望,you'si'qian'tang'jiang'shang'wang
有司昔者患不公,you'si'xi'zhe'huan'bu'gong
又似煮彭越,you'si'zhu'peng'yue
犹诵麦青青,you'song'mai'qing'qing
幽邃信难妉,you'sui'xin'nan'dan
有田不归如江水,you'tian'bu'gui'ru'jiang'shui
游鯈不可数,you'tiao'bu'ke'shu
有味出吾囿,you'wei'chu'wu'you
有味难名只自知,you'wei'nan'ming'zhi'zi'zhi
又闻缑山好泉眼,you'wen'gou'shan'hao'quan'yan
又无狂太守,you'wu'kuang'tai'shou
又无穆天子,you'wu'mu'tian'zi
犹喜初无封禅书,you'xi'chu'wu'feng'shan'shu
犹喜大江同一味,you'xi'da'jiang'tong'yi'wei
游戏得自在,you'xi'de'zi'zai
忧喜迭相攻,you'xi'die'xiang'gong
犹喜孤山下,you'xi'gu'shan'xia
犹喜见诸郎,you'xi'jian'zhu'lang
游戏养形躯,you'xi'yang'xing'qu

犹喜诸郎有曹志,you'xi'zhu'lang'you'cao'zhi
牖下窥龙稍眩真,you'xia'kui'long'shao'xuan'zhen

昨日放鱼回,zuo'ri'fang'yu'hui
昨日故人书,zuo'ri'gu'ren'shu
昨日国子师,zuo'ri'guo'zi'shi
昨日忽出门,zuo'ri'hu'chu'men
昨日见张三,zuo'ri'jian'zhang'san
昨日亲看来,zuo'ri'qin'kan'lai
昨日散幽步,zuo'ri'san'you'bu
昨日杏花浑不见,zuo'ri'xing'hua'hun'bu'jian
昨日云阴重,zuo'ri'yun'yin'zhong
昨日追欢意正违,zuo'ri'zhui'huan'yi'zheng'wei
坐上传觞把菊枝,zuo'shang'chuan'shang'ba'ju'zhi
坐上烟岚生紫翠,zuo'shang'yan'lan'sheng'zi'cui
坐上一樽虽得满,zuo'shang'yi'zun'sui'de'man

作诗不须工,zuo'shi'bu'xu'gong

作诗寄彭泽,zuo'shi'ji'peng'ze

作诗寄余哀,zuo'shi'ji'yu'ai
作诗记余欢,zuo'shi'ji'yu'huan

作诗解子忧,zuo'shi'jie'zi'you
作事今世惊,zuo'shi'jin'shi'jing
作诗愧谢公笑欢,zuo'shi'kui'xie'gong'xiao'huan
坐失两鬓青,zuo'shi'liang'bin'qing
作诗聊遣意,zuo'shi'liao'qian'yi
坐失岭峤阻,zuo'shi'ling'qiao'zu

作诗铭其背,zuo'shi'ming'qi'bei
作诗颇似六一语,zuo'shi'po'si'liu'yi'yu
作诗颂其美,zuo'shi'song'qi'mei
作诗虽未造藩阈,zuo'shi'sui'wei'zao'fan'yu
坐视万物皆浮埃,zuo'shi'wan'wu'jie'fu'ai
作诗相楚挽,zuo'shi'xiang'chu'wan
作诗谢二子,zuo'shi'xie'er'zi
坐使学士劳骸筋,zuo'shi'xue'shi'lao'hai'jin
作诗遗故人,zuo'shi'yi'gu'ren
作诗一笑君应闻,zuo'shi'yi'xiao'jun'ying'wen
作事由来未合时,zuo'shi'you'lai'wei'he'shi
作诗犹似建安初,zuo'shi'you'si'jian'an'chu
坐受尘土堆胸肠,zuo'shou'chen'tu'dui'xiong'chang
左手持蟹螯,zuo'shou'chi'xie'ao
左手挂弓横撚箭,zuo'shou'gua'gong'heng'nian'jian
坐受瘴雾侵,zuo'shou'zhang'wu'qin
作书贷粟监河侯,zuo'shu'dai'su'jian'he'hou
坐数荒村长短更,zuo'shu'huang'cun'chang'duan'geng
作书寄君君莫笑,zuo'shu'ji'jun'jun'mo'xiao
作书问陈子,zuo'shu'wen'chen'zi
坐睡落巾帻,zuo'shui'luo'jin'ze
坐睡梦江潭,zuo'shui'meng'jiang'tan

坐也坐不定,zuo'ye'zuo'bu'ding
作意春风更一来,zuo'yi'chun'feng'geng'yi'lai

坐咏梁公觉有神,zuo'yong'liang'gong'jue'you'shen
